Package com.composum.pages.commons.service

Class PagesResourceManager.TemplateImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.composum.pages.commons.service.PagesResourceManager.TemplateImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceManager.Template, Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    PagesResourceManager
    protected class PagesResourceManager.TemplateImpl
extends Object
implements ResourceManager.Template
    a template is used to create new resources (pages) wth predefined content (structure); the template contains also content hierarchy rules for pages and component design rules for containers and elements; a page created from a template is referencing this template and using the rules in content operations, the rules are not copied to resources during creation from a template a reference property is set instead of copying the rules; templates are cached to improve the performance of rule calculations
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public TemplateImpl​(@Nonnull
                    org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource templateResource)
        A template can be a Site or Page template with a 'jcr:content' child resourece containing the template rules but it can also be a simple resource with the template rules properties (e.g. for folder rules).

      • getDesign

        @Nullable
public ResourceManager.Design getDesign​(@Nonnull
                                        org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource pageContent,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        String relativePath,
                                        @Nullable
                                        String resourceType)
        Retrieves es the design rules for an element of a page; the design rules are configured as elements of a 'cpp:design' child node of the templates content resource.
        Specified by:
        getDesign in interface ResourceManager.Template
        Parameters:
        pageContent - the content resource of the page
        relativePath - the path of the element relative to the pages content resource
        resourceType - the designated or overlayed resource type of the content element
        Returns:
        the design model; 'null' if no design rules found

      • findDesign

        @Nullable
protected ResourceManager.Design findDesign​(@Nonnull
                                            org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource templateNode,
                                            @Nonnull
                                            org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource contentNode,
                                            @Nonnull
                                            String relativePath,
                                            @Nullable
                                            String elementType,
                                            int weight)
        The internal 'find' for a design is searching for the best matching 'cpp:design' content element of the template and then searching for the best matching element node of the selected 'cpp:design' resource.
        Parameters:
        templateNode - the current content resource of the template (recursive)
        contentNode - the current content resource of the content elements page (recursive)
        relativePath - the current elements path within the current content node
        elementType - the designated or overlayed resource type of the content element
        weight - the current weight for a matching design resource
        Returns:
        the determined design; 'null' if n o appropriate design resource found

      • findInDesign

        @Nullable
protected PagesResourceManager.DesignImpl findInDesign​(@Nonnull
                                                       org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource templateNode,
                                                       @Nonnull
                                                       org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource contentNode,
                                                       @Nonnull
                                                       String relativePath,
                                                       @Nullable
                                                       String elementType,
                                                       int weight)
        Determines the element of a 'cpp:design' resource which is matching to a content element; recursive traversal through the design hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        templateNode - the current content resource of the template (recursive)
        contentNode - the current content resource of the content elements page (recursive)
        relativePath - the current elements path within the current content node
        elementType - the designated or overlayed resource type of the content element
        weight - the current weight for a matching design resource
        Returns:
        a matching design resource if found, otherwise 'null'
